name: Cyberpunk Helpdesk
description:
Live the exciting life of a Cyberpunk helpdesk hotline.

MOUSE AND KEYBOARD REQUIRED

ENTER/SPACE/ESC are main keys, if you're playing in fullscreen you can click the exit icon on the top left instead of using ESC

Unlike last year, I tried to make this one more subtly bad and actually put a TON of effort into it. Sadly, due to the game concept being so complex, I didn't have time to iron out all bugs. Maybe that actually helps in this case?

Reuploaded to fix one game breaking and some smaller bugs (hopefully)

Reuploaded again to fix another rare (?) gamebreaking bug

Reuploaded to fix another pretty bad bug, oh god

Reuploaded yet again because I realized I made a typo in the name of the music's creator (sorry!)

Made for SBIG 2018 Jam
